mapper.delete: delete from leave_info where epnum = #{id} and apply_time = #{date}
mapper.select: select * from leave_info as l, employee_info as e where l.epnum = e.epnum and e.superior_epnum = #{id} and l_mark = 0
mapper.update: update leave_info set l_mark = #{type}, leave_confirm_person = #{name}, leave_comfirm_descrip = #{desc} where apply_time = #{date} and epnum = #{id}
